name: Zen Hanzi
description:
ZH is primarily meant as a fun way to refresh your knowledge of complex hanzi with the emphasis on correct components. 

You can watch a short tutorial here: https://youtu.be/5v-4aqWEmCs

While ZH would be most useful for novice/intermediate learners of Chinese, I'm trying to make it as beginner-friendly as possible.

This is a demo version with only 10 hanzi.

The melody is "Chinese Traditional Yanqin Trap Loop" by  KiestyleProductions
